thread.title: Rugby star Scott Hastings' missing wife found safe
thread.title_full: Rugby star Scott Hastings' missing wife found safe

title: Rugby star Scott Hastings' missing wife found safe
text:
Rugby star Scott Hastings' missing wife found safe 29 March 2017 These are external links and will open in a new window Close share panel Image copyright SNS The wife of Scottish rugby star Scott Hastings has been found safe and well after being missing for more than 24 hours. 
Jennifer Hastings, 52, disappeared from Warriston Drive, Edinburgh, at about 10:00 on Tuesday without contacting her family. 
Police Scotland thanked everyone for their help. 
Scott Hastings won 65 caps at centre for Scotland from 1986 to 1997. Related Topics
